amendment.description: Amendment designates $1 million for the FY 2012 construction funds for the National Park Service to be used for construction of joint law enforcement centers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase and then decrease funding for National Park Service Construction by $1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Carter amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Carter amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Carter.
